articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Bitcoin falls 7.7% to $55,408 - Reuters
articles.description: Bitcoin, the world's biggest and best-known cryptocurrency, dropped 7.7% to $55,408.08 on Sunday, losing $4,624.21 from its previous close.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
April 18 (Reuters) - Bitcoin, the worlds biggest and best-known cryptocurrency, dropped 7.7% to $55,408.08 on Sunday, losing $4,624.21 from its previous close.
